title: One-step hydrothermal synthesis of a Ni3S2–FeMoO4 nanowire–nanosheet heterostructure array for synergistically boosted oxygen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9109-9113
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01770F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Han Chen, Jing Zhang, Rui Wan, Xiang Zhang, Qijun Pan, Mingtao Li, Bin Chen
We propose a one-step hydrothermal strategy to fabricate hierarchical Ni3S2–FeMoO4 nanowire–nanosheet heterostructures on NiFe-foam as structurally-integrated electrodes for synergistically boosted OER at high current density.
